(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (RB Up) (IN till)
      (NP (JJ last) (NN month)))
    (, ,)))


advmod(till-2, Up-1)
root(ROOT-0, till-2)
amod(month-4, last-3)
pobj(till-2, month-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ gastronomic) (JJ holy) (NN grail))
    (VP (VBD had)
      (VP (VBN been)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB partake)
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (JJ legendary) (NNP Matsuzaka) (NN beef))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (NNP Japan))))))))))
    (. .)))


poss(grail-4, my-1)
amod(grail-4, gastronomic-2)
amod(grail-4, holy-3)
nsubj(been-6, grail-4)
aux(been-6, had-5)
root(ROOT-0, been-6)
aux(partake-8, to-7)
xcomp(been-6, partake-8)
prep(partake-8, of-9)
det(beef-13, the-10)
amod(beef-13, legendary-11)
nn(beef-13, Matsuzaka-12)
pobj(of-9, beef-13)
prep(beef-13, in-14)
pobj(in-14, Japan-15)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBD alluded)
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (DT this)))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP I))
          (VP (VBD was)
            (VP (VBN interviewed)
              (PP (IN by)
                (NP
                  (NP (NNP Teo) (NNP Pao) (NNP Lin))
                  (PP (IN in)
                    (NP (DT the) (NNP Straits) (NNP Times)))))
              (NP (JJ last) (NN year))
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB when))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP she))
                  (VP (VBD asked)
                    (NP (PRP me))
                    (SBAR
                      (WHNP (WP what))
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ last) (NN meal))
                        (VP (MD would)
                          (VP (VB be)))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(alluded-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, alluded-2)
prep(alluded-2, to-3)
pobj(to-3, this-4)
advmod(interviewed-8, when-5)
nsubjpass(interviewed-8, I-6)
auxpass(interviewed-8, was-7)
advcl(alluded-2, interviewed-8)
prep(interviewed-8, by-9)
nn(Lin-12, Teo-10)
nn(Lin-12, Pao-11)
pobj(by-9, Lin-12)
prep(Lin-12, in-13)
det(Times-16, the-14)
nn(Times-16, Straits-15)
pobj(in-13, Times-16)
amod(year-18, last-17)
tmod(interviewed-8, year-18)
advmod(asked-21, when-19)
nsubj(asked-21, she-20)
advcl(interviewed-8, asked-21)
dobj(asked-21, me-22)
dobj(be-28, what-23)
poss(meal-26, my-24)
amod(meal-26, last-25)
nsubj(be-28, meal-26)
aux(be-28, would-27)
dep(asked-21, be-28)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB Now))
    (ADVP (RB ,))))


root(ROOT-0, Now-1)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN in)
      (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ post-Matsuzaka) (NN state)))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, in-1)
poss(state-4, my-2)
amod(state-4, post-Matsuzaka-3)
pobj(in-1, state-4)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB reset)
            (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ culinary) (NNS sights))
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP
                (NP (PRP$ my) (JJ next) (JJ holy) (NN grail))
                (SBAR
                  (WHNP (WDT which))
                  (S
                    (VP (VBZ is)
                      (S
                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB have)
                            (NP
                              (NP (DT a) (NN meal))
                              (PP (IN at)
                                (NP (NNP El) (NNP Bulli))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(have-2, I-1)
root(ROOT-0, have-2)
aux(reset-4, to-3)
xcomp(have-2, reset-4)
poss(sights-7, my-5)
amod(sights-7, culinary-6)
dobj(reset-4, sights-7)
prep(reset-4, on-8)
poss(grail-12, my-9)
amod(grail-12, next-10)
amod(grail-12, holy-11)
pobj(on-8, grail-12)
nsubj(is-14, which-13)
rcmod(grail-12, is-14)
aux(have-16, to-15)
xcomp(is-14, have-16)
det(meal-18, a-17)
dobj(have-16, meal-18)
prep(meal-18, at-19)
nn(Bulli-21, El-20)
pobj(at-19, Bulli-21)


(ROOT
  (SBAR
    (WHADVP (WRB When))
    (S
      (NP (PRP I))
      (VP (VBD found)
        (PRT (RP out))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP I))
            (VP (VBD had)
              (NP (DT the) (NN opportunity)
                (S
                  (VP (TO to)
                    (VP (VB visit)
                      (NP (NNP Tokyo))
                      (NP (JJ last) (NN month))))
                  (, ,))))))))))


advmod(found-3, When-1)
nsubj(found-3, I-2)
root(ROOT-0, found-3)
prt(found-3, out-4)
mark(had-7, that-5)
nsubj(had-7, I-6)
ccomp(found-3, had-7)
det(opportunity-9, the-8)
dobj(had-7, opportunity-9)
aux(visit-11, to-10)
infmod(opportunity-9, visit-11)
dobj(visit-11, Tokyo-12)
amod(month-14, last-13)
tmod(visit-11, month-14)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (RB very) (JJ first) (NN thought))
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT that))
        (S
          (VP (VBD came)
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB mind))))))))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB find)
            (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN place))
            (S
              (VP (TO to)
                (VP (VB eat)
                  (NP (NNP Matsuzaka) (NN beef)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(thought-4, the-1)
advmod(thought-4, very-2)
amod(thought-4, first-3)
nsubj(was-9, thought-4)
nsubj(came-6, that-5)
rcmod(thought-4, came-6)
aux(mind-8, to-7)
xcomp(came-6, mind-8)
root(ROOT-0, was-9)
aux(find-11, to-10)
xcomp(was-9, find-11)
det(place-14, the-12)
amod(place-14, best-13)
dobj(find-11, place-14)
aux(eat-16, to-15)
xcomp(find-11, eat-16)
nn(beef-18, Matsuzaka-17)
dobj(eat-16, beef-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (ADVP (RB actually))
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (JJ main) (NN goal))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (DT the) (JJ whole) (NN trip)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(goal-6, This-1)
cop(goal-6, was-2)
advmod(goal-6, actually-3)
det(goal-6, the-4)
amod(goal-6, main-5)
root(ROOT-0, goal-6)
prep(goal-6, of-7)
det(trip-10, the-8)
amod(trip-10, whole-9)
pobj(of-7, trip-10)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP (DT The) (NN rest))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP (DT the) (NN food))))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (ADJP (JJ secondary)
        (SBAR (IN as)
          (S
            (VP (VBD were)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN sightseeing))
                (PP (IN around)
                  (NP (NNP Tokyo)))))))))
    (. .)))


det(rest-2, The-1)
nsubj(secondary-7, rest-2)
prep(rest-2, of-3)
det(food-5, the-4)
pobj(of-3, food-5)
cop(secondary-7, were-6)
root(ROOT-0, secondary-7)
mark(sightseeing-11, as-8)
cop(sightseeing-11, were-9)
det(sightseeing-11, the-10)
dep(secondary-7, sightseeing-11)
prep(sightseeing-11, around-12)
pobj(around-12, Tokyo-13)
